alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 2:50PM EDT until April 10 at 4:24AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey...Pennsylvania... Delaware River At Riegelsville affecting Mercer, Hunterdon, and Bucks Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Delaware River At Riegelsville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, The entrance to Bull Island State Park is closed. Unsafe to cross over to Treasure Island Scout Camp. At 15.0 feet, Treasure Island Scout Camp floods. At 18.0 feet, River Road floods in Pohatcong Township, north of the bridge. At 22.0 feet, Pohatcong Creek floods Creek Road due to high and backwater from the Delaware River. The Musconetcong River also floods Mount Joy Road due to high and backwater from the Delaware River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 23.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.8 feet on 10/16/1955. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (2 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Stg Time Date Delaware River Riegelsville 22.0 18.7 Fri 1 pm 23.0 19.6 23.4 8am 4/09 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM EDT.
